title: Property Editor displays layout item properties in Master Page viewer
description: The Property Editor is displaying properties of layout items when switching to the Master Page viewer, causing confusion for users who might mistake it for the Master Page Editor.
OB: Users may assume it's the Master Page Editor and unintentionally set properties without clicking on the Master Page viewer first.
EB: The Property Editor should reflect the properties of the Master Page when in the Master Page viewer.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the page with a Master Page.
3. Access the Property Editor.
4. Switch to the Master Page viewer.
5. Observe the displayed properties â€“ they should match those of the Master Page, not individual layout items.
